title: Serhii Pavlov
text:
Serhii Pavlov (born 18 July 1997) is a Ukrainian professional <a href="basketball">basketball</a> player who last played for <a href="Kyiv-Basket">Kyiv-Basket</a> of the <a href="Ukrainian%20Basketball%20SuperLeague">Ukrainian Basketball SuperLeague</a>.
National team.
He represented the Ukraine at multiple international tournaments at both junior and senior level. He took part in the <a href="2019%20FIBA%20Basketball%20World%20Cup%20qualification%20%28Europe%29">2019 FIBA Basketball World Cup qualification</a> and the <a href="2013%20FIBA%20Europe%20Under-16%20Championship">2013 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship</a>.
He also played at the <a href="Basketball%20at%20the%202019%20Summer%20Universiade">2019 Summer Universiade</a> where he helped win the silver medal. 
Personal.
Pavlov is originally from <a href="Donetsk">Donetsk</a>. He started basketball in the second grade. He hails from a famity of athletes as his mother is a basketball player while his father practices <a href="pentathlon">pentathlon</a>.
